articles.title: Bret Taylor’s Sierra raises $350M at a $10B valuation
articles.description: Customer service AI agent startup Sierra claims to have hundreds of customers, including SoFi, Ramp, and Brex, among others.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Rivian makes its second small workforce cut of the year ahead of R2 SUV launch
articles.description: The company previously laid off around 140 workers in its manufacturing division in June.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Facebook is trying to make ‘pokes’ happen again
articles.description: The poke-tracking feature is largely designed to appeal to younger users who have grown up with gamification elements built into their social apps,
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Stripe enlists a who’s who, including Anthropic, OpenAI, and Paradigm, to build a new blockchain
articles.description: Stripe is funding a new blockchain called Tempo to process stablecoins faster. And many big names are joining the effort.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg sues Mark Zuckerberg
articles.description: Mark S. Zuckerberg, an attorney, says that he's losing business because his Facebook business profile keeps getting disabled.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: TED leader’s $300M ‘valley of death’ fund might be just what later-stage climate tech needs
articles.description: The new fund hopes to send a "Seqouia-like" signal to other investors that there are promising later-stage climate tech startups waiting to be funded.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Fashion retailers partner to offer personalized AI styling tool ‘Ella’
articles.description: Ella provides recommendations to customers across the three retailers on what to purchase or rent to make an outfit come to life.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: X’s encrypted DM feature, XChat, is rolling out more broadly
articles.description: Though the feature shipped in beta in May, XChat is now accessible for more users, including those who do not subscribe to X Premium.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: OpenAI announces AI-powered hiring platform to take on LinkedIn
articles.description: The OpenAI Jobs Platform is set to launch in mid-2026 and will use AI to match candidates with businesses.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: Nepal blocks Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, X over rule breach, amid censorship concerns
articles.description: Nepal has moved to block 26 social media platforms for failing to comply with its registration requirements.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: AI logistics startup Augment, from Deliverr’s founder, raises massive $85M Series A
articles.description: The new funding, which was led by Redpoint, comes just five months after the startup launched out of stealth with a $25 million seed round.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Waymo cleared to offer robotaxi rides at San Jose airport
articles.description: It's the first airport in California that Waymo will offer rides to and from. The company's been active at the Phoenix airport for nearly two years.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Sequoia’s Roelof Botha joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 for a 20th anniversary conversation on the future of venture
articles.description: For more than two decades, Botha has helped shape some of the world’s most iconic companies — and his perspective has never been more important.
articles.author: TechCrunch Events

articles.title: iPhone 17, the ‘thinnest iPhone ever,’ and everything else we’re expecting out of Apple’s hardware event
articles.description: From a new slim iPhone Air model to redesigned AirPods, here's what to expect from this year's Apple event.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Threads challenges X by offering free support for up to 10K characters, plus prominent links
articles.description: Meta says that the 10,000 characters give people more room to express themselves, but also allows them to promote their work and drive others to
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: GE Aerospace to invest $300M in Beta Technologies to pair up on hybrid-electric power
articles.description: The new partnership comes as hybrid solutions gain momentum in the advanced air mobility (AAM) space, a catch-all term to describe the next
articles.author: Aria Alamalhodaei

articles.title: Google Photos upgrades its image-to-video feature with Veo 3
articles.description: Google Photos already offers video generation through its "Photo to video" feature, but the company says the addition of Veo 3 enhances that
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Cloud provider Lambda may be gearing up for an IPO
articles.description: Lambda, which allows companies to rent GPUs, is reportedly following its rival CoreWeave to the public market.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Captions rebrands as Mirage, expands beyond creator tools to AI video research
articles.description: Captions, the AI-powered video creation and editing app for content creators, is rebranding to Mirage.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg encouraged execs to do MMA training with him
articles.description: Former Meta exec Nick Clegg recalls an MMA session with Zuckerberg at a management offsite.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling
